about_the_game:
D&D Adventurer's League 09-04 The Day of the Devil


The streets of Baldur's Gate run red with blood. Old blood. The blood of Hellriders. Someone or something is punishing the children for the sins of the father and it's time to put it to an end. Who and where is Gharizol?


Part Three of the
Betrayal is in the Blood series of adventures.


A Two-to-Four-Hour Adventure for 1st through 4th Level Characters (APL 3).


Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Danny Stratton

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
